name: Teratini VR
description: In this VR adventure, you are the Dragon Mage who glides through the air, smashes attacks back at opponents, and beckons a dragon when the going gets rough. Invent new moves and perfect them in the Sanctuary before taking back Teratini.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space
